document.heading: Loretta Carter Hanes Pesticide Consumer Notification Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-168, the “Loretta Carter Hanes Pesticide Consumer Notification Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-493 which was referred to the Committee on Public Service and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 4, 2008, and April 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 14, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-342 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-168 became effective on June 5, 2008.
